item.title: West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction (WBPD) Map v4.7 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 12, 2025

West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction (WBPD) Map v4.7 ETS2

It’s a new little add-on map mod that contains an extensive rework of the West Balkans DLC map for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). This add-on offers a fresh take on the existing map, introducing new pathways, enhanced road networks, and undiscovered scenic landscapes that push the boundaries of exploration.

New update on version 4.7:
– Compatibility update for ETS2 1.56 game version
– Extended M1.8 road from Lončari to Šićki Brod junction near Tuzla (now a complete route, serving as a new alternative road to Sarajevo)
– Reworked scenery town (major scale): Lukavac
– Reworked M4 road section from Doboj, then Lukavac, to Šićki Brod junction near Tuzla
– Several bug fixes from the previous version

Requirements:
– ETS2 version 1.56 or newer
– Only one required map DLC: West Balkans (no other DLCs needed)
(For example, if you have “West Balkans DLC” but not “Iberia DLC”, you can still play this mod. Of course, it also works if you own all DLCs.)

Map installation:
– Install it the same way as other map mods. Place the file “wbpd_addon_map_main.scs” into your mod directory:
“C:Users\DocumentsEuro Truck Simulator 2mod”
– If using this map in a map combo setup, position it above other (add-on) maps in the Mod Manager.

Credits: Another5_Mrd1

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: ProMods road & cities Silesia merge v1.7.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 12, 2025

ProMods road & cities Silesia merge v1.7.1 ETS2

Mod restoring roads and cities from ProMods overwritten by Poland Rebuilding. To work with rusmap, you need to download a road connection by Hi Sora. When using Roex, the mods should be arranged in the following order:

– PM – RM – PR RC ProMods Roads and Cities Compatibility
– ProMods Roads & Cities Silesia Merge
– Promods – RusMap – Poland Rebuilding RC
– ProMods RusMap Roextended Connector (ProMods priority version)
– RusMap
– Silesia
– Poland Rebuilding
– ProMods Middle East (optional)
– Promods
– Roex
– Promods The Great Steppe (optional)

Roads:
– Expressway S16 Olsztyn Wschód – Mrągowo and Ełk bypass
– Expressway S61 Kisielnica – Budzisko
– National road 59 Mrągowo bypass

Rebuilt roads:
– Motorway A1 Toruń – Łódź
– National road 16 Mrągowo – Ełk
– National road 17 Piaski – Zamość

Cities:
– Krasnystaw
– Mrągowo

Rebuilt cities:
– Siedlce
– Updated to ETS 2 1.56, PM 2.76, PR 2.6.1 and Silesia 1.7.1
– Rebuilt national road 64 Piątnica – Jeżewo

Credits: Blancuś

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: WBPD (West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction) Map v4.7 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 12, 2025

WBPD (West Balkans Path-Breaker’s Direction) Map v4.7 ETS2

It’s a new little add-on map mod that contains an extensive rework of the West Balkans DLC map for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).
This add-on offers a fresh take on the existing map, introducing new pathways, enhanced road networks, and undiscovered scenic landscapes that push the boundaries of exploration.

a) Croatia
New explorable cities: Slavonski Brod and Vukovar
New scenery town: Županja
Reworked A3 (E70) motorway section from Slavonski Brod to Županja
Fully reworked “Slavonika” A5 (E73) motorway, connecting the Hungarian border to the Bosnian border crossing (Donji Svilaj), including the “3rd Guards Brigade Kune Bridge” over the Drava River
Major rework in Osijek, including: Industrijska Četvrt area with a new MAN truck dealer, Explorable river port of Luka Osijek, and Reworked factory in Nemetin
Numerous secret roads around Osijek Airport
New roads added: D55 from Vukovar to Županja, and D53 around Slavonski Brod
b) Bosnia & Herzegovina

New explorable city: Doboj
New scenery towns: (Bosanski) Brod, Matuzići (south of Doboj), Modriča, (Bosanski) Šamac, and Orašje
Reworked an (existing) scenery town: Lukavac
Fully reworked “9. Januar” Motorway from Doboj to Banja Luka
New roads added: M14.1 and M17 connecting Doboj, Kladari (motorway exit), (Bosanski) Brod, Modriča, and (Bosanski) Šamac, R462a from (Bosanski) Šamac to Lončari junction, M4 from Matuzići directly to Banja Luka, and M1.8 from Orašje directly to Šićki Brod junction near Tuzla
Reworked Liješnica paper factory (SCS_Paper) and its surroundings

REQUIREMENTS
ETS2 1.56 (and above).
Only a map DLC: West Balkans

WBPD Map v4.7:
Compatibility update for ETS2 1.56 game version.
Extended M1.8 road from Lončari to Šićki Brod junction near Tuzla (now a complete route, serving as a new alternative road to Sarajevo).
Reworked (existing) scenery town in major scale: Lukavac.
Reworked part of M4 road from Doboj – Lukavac – Šićki Brod junction (Tuzla).
Several bug fixes from the previous version.

Credits: Septian_MR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
